acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: accused Hitler Rabha to undergo rigorous imprisonment for one year and to pay a fine of Rs 1,000/- only i/d to undergo rigorous imprisonment for one month, for committing the offence u/s 363 IPC and to undergo rigourous imprisonment for 7 year and to pay a fine of rs 10,000/- only i/d to undergo further rigorous imprisonment for one year, for committing the offence to u/s 4 of POCSO Act, 2012
